metadata.title: CVE-2022-44640 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Heimdal before 7.7.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code because of an invalid free in the ASN.1 codec used by the Key Distribution Center (KDC).

notes.note: mdeslaur> per upstream Samba, this vulnerability doesn't actually affect Samba, but the code has been patched in case the API is used in the future. See the following post: https://bugzilla.samba.org/show_bug.cgi?id=14929#c15

criterions.comment: heimdal package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
